name: DoGooder
description:
Be the Hero and DoGooder!

One Kid,  A small town, and plenty of things to do. Go out and help all the people in your town. Bag Groceries, Help the Elderly, and many more tasks to do. Think you got what it takes?

Supports Xbox and Keyboard

Join the Discord!

I will be continuing to add more minigames and more things as  development continues! Come in and help with our development with your feedback and advice!

Credits: 

Nathan Bartone - Developer/Artist/Animator - Twitter - Twitch - Itch
